contents.content: To enable audio, you need to unmute your watch. First open control centre.
⬆️ Swipe up from the very bottom of the screen to enter control center and look for that little bell icon.
This bell should be grey rather than red/pink. If it's grey then you're done!

title: How do I move back and forth in a video (scrubbing)?

contents.content: Simply tap the orange bar at the bottom of the player and turn the digital crown to scrub!

title: Video playback pauses for no apparent reason

contents.content: This is likely caused by bluetooth devices like AirPods connecting or a slow internet connection, though this shouldn't be an issue with adaptive quality selection in version 1.2.9
Background playback is now available on WatchTube v1.2.9. Update your app from the watchOS App Store, then just leave the app and playback will continue uninterrupted on watchOS 9 upwards!
